Perform_general_assessment.text:
100% O2 NRB and Obtain Vital Signs
If hypotensive, elevate lower extremities IV NS TKO
Cardiac Monitor / 12 lead ECG / Pulse Oximetry

Assess_for_signs_of_hypotension_and_poor.text:
Weak Pulses
Capillary refill 3 seconds
Mottled or cool skin
Altered mental status
Hypoxia

Other_signs_of_shock.text:
Tachycardia, fever AND one of the following
Cancer
Sickle Cell
Transplant
Indwelling catheter
Immune deficiency
Severe developmental delay

Yes.text:
Give (weight *10)mL NS bolus.
Reassess for pulmonary edema after each bolus
Repeat up to 3 boluses

No.text:
Give (weight *20)mL NS bolus.
Reassess for pulmonary edema after each bolus
Repeat up to 3 boluses

Advanced_Notification.text: If treating for shock then ensure advanced notification to receiving hospital.

Yes_2.text:
Begin
dopamine
drip with titration to age appropriate SBP
Further orders per on-line physician

Advanced_Notification.text: If treating for shock then ensure advanced notification to receiving hospital.

Begin
dopamine
drip with titration to age appropriate SBP
Further orders per on-line physician
